messages.content: This information pertains to the Program Structure for Second Year Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Engineering.
What are the courses offered in Semester IV?
In Semester IV, the following courses are offered: Engineering Mathematics-IV, Analysis of Algorithm, Database Management System, Theory of Computer Science, Internet of Things.
Can you provide details about the examination scheme for the course ADC405?
For ADC405, Internet of Things, the examination scheme includes 20 marks for internal assessment, 20 marks for term work, and 60 marks for the end semester exam.
How many credits are assigned for Semester IV?
The total credit assigned for Semester IV is 23.
Is there a lab for ADL403, Internet of Things Lab?
Yes, there is a lab for ADL403.
What is the teaching scheme for the course ADL404?
ADL404, Python Programming Lab, has a teaching scheme of 2 practical contact hours and 2 tutorial contact hours.
